data.message: over 300$ for front role... Wow Suck my dick.

replies.message: Well he's the greatest rapper in the world of course front row seats ( not a biased opinoin he just sold more of his albums than any other rapper) and u want to get the tickets early like very very early

I know but come on... If anyone should be against those kind of prices it should be Em... He promised us a brewery to turn us all in to alchys the least he can do is lower costs... Lower costs and do more shows.   He's my fav artist so trust me I get it, But its just bogus.
